title: what are cutoffs for 2nd round Counselling in all the branches pls let me know my rank is 57XX what

comments.body: Don't keep hope on 2nd round man, only surrended seats will be available. Last year cutoff decreased also

If your rank is higher than the round 1 closing ranks, then it is almost impossible to get a seat in round 2. Although seats are surrendered before the second round, do not expect more than 20 (being extremely generous here, since last year it was <10) per branch. The aspirants that show up to the second round also include the kids with ranks lower than round 1 closing ranks who are directly appearing for round 2. So for example if CS closed at 1100 in round 1, expect students with ranks <1100 to also show up for round 2. Given this, it's always safe to assume that if you don't get a seat during round 1, it's unlikely you will get one in round 2.
the counselling was closed just before my rank was announced so do u think there is a chance?

all i can do is hope for the best

cause i messed up my comedK too
Which branch? If it's CS or AIML then mostly no
EEE or mechanical is what i am expecting
